This is almost worthless. Unless you get the CELL BE SDK from IBM and write programs to use the cores efficiently, it only uses the two ppc cores on the cell while the other 8 SPEs sit there and do nothing. There's no driver for the RSX either. Your PS3 essentially becomes a computer with no graphics card and only a dual core ppc processor when running this. Sony doesn't want much access to the PS3's hardware from ydl because they're afraid that people will pirate games and run them under ydl.
